description:
What is up, humans?! ♡ Calliope Mori（森 カリオペ）here. 
Today, we'll be talking about my newly released song "DEAD BEATS." It will be released beforehand, so you may give it a listen at that time!
jk here it be: https://youtu.be/6ydgEipkUEU
It almost didn't get finished.
I will tell you the tale, live. It's a tale of no sleep, goblins scratching at my door, and the power of homies.

I shall prepare 3 wine bottles.
No, there are no guests. They are just for me.
------------------------------------
よろしくお願いします！みんな、一緒に楽しめると嬉しいですね。
仲良くなりたいです！日本語でも頑張る、あたしね～

[Hashtags]
(LIVE) #calliolive
(LIVE) #カリオライブ
(Music) #callioP
(Fanart) #カリイラスト or #callillust
(Fan-name) Dead Beats or デッドビーツ

[Twitter]
https://twitter.com/moricalliope
@moricalliope

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
[Takanashi Kiara]
■Channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHsx4Hqa-1ORjQTh9TYDhww
Twitter: @takanashikiara
＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

✿[Viewer Rules]✿
What is up, humans! Thanks for checkin’ my stream!
If you follow these rules, maybe I'll wait just a bit longer... :}
(Do it.)

1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll.
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Please refrain from chatting before the stream starts to prevent any issues.
As long as you follow the rules above, you can chat in any language.

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

title: 【SONG RELEASE PARTY+雑談】"DEAD BEATS" Song Review! This song was GIRI GIRI AF.
